author: news24.com
title: The other side of the coin
text:
It is with absolute sadness that I take note of your decision to stop comments on News 24 articles.
Being a white male that has tertiary qualifications it allowed me to see the views of all citizens from all walks of live. I made a point to read other people’s opinions on published matters. Yes we had our daily attention seekers that commented just to provoke people to react, but the majority of all comments were sincere and enlightening.
Due to my type of work I do not get the opportunity to mingle with the diverse population in our country on a daily basis. This allowed me to look differently at normal articles as we are not all christens/ Muslims/believers…, black/ white /male/ female, rich/poor, educated/ uneducated…
By closing your comments I will now not be able to understand the other side of the coin….
